title: War of the Roses - Put Lotion on Them & Squeeze Them
description: Calvin called the show today to figure out if his Wife is cheating on him. He found a Monogrammed lighter in her clothes with some suspicious initials on it. And some UNHINGED text messages he found on her phone. Is she cheating?? We find out today!
